text:
Hello, I'm accessing this image in an array in a drag and drop template and everything is outputting correctly until I make it global (global=true). Can someone tell me why and how to access it correctly._`{# logo slider global#}`_
    `{% dnd_section padding={ right: 0, left: 0} %}`
          `{% dnd_module path='../modules/logo-slider-global-01'`
              `logos=[ {` 
                  `'src': get_asset_url('../images/sample-logo.png'),`
                  `'loading': 'lazy'`
                  `}`
                `]`
         `%}`
         `{% end_dnd_module %}`
    `{% end_dnd_section %}`Â (edited)
